description: Performs a linear interpolation for each of the no-data values (`null`) in the array given, except for the first and last value.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description:
An array of numbers and no-data values.

If the given array is a labeled array, the labels must have a natural/inherent label order and it expects the labels to be sorted accordingly. This is the default behavior in openEO for spatial and temporal dimensions.

returns.description: An array with no-data values being replaced with interpolated values. If not at least 2 numerical values are available in the array, the array stays the same.
